inclusion.criterion: Mothers of healthy Singleton, full term infants
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Mothers will be excluded if they: Are not insured by Medicaid, Ritecare, or Neighborhood Health Plan.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Will not be taking the baby home at hospital discharge.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 5 months old male with undescended testis. The mother had a normal pregnancy and is fluent in English.
